channel.title: Video on Nandixer
channel.description: Recent content in Video on Nandixer

item.title: Archmage with Acheron and Vainglory
item.description: Introduction Alright, this guide will be pointlessly complicated AND pointlessly specific. Are you in the 1% of players that care about a difference between 22k and 24k DPS when farming on ArchMage? And if you are, do you happen to be in the other 1% to have wasted $100 on Acheron? Mechanics Acheron Acheron, when used, applies a DoT to the user. This stacks up to 30x for about ~1500, depending on the active buffs.

item.title: Ultra Malgor Guide
item.description: Introduction Malgor, The First Speaker at /join ultraspeaker is currently the most complicated, but also most rewarding Ultra to beat. His Insignias offer Radiant Goddess of War, the best-in-slot boost armor for all situations. Most players tend to get Dauntless first though, because of how overpowered that enhancement is on some classes. Spoiler: Main Story, Malgor Questline Malgor is called a Speaker, because he speaks. A Speaker is a more evolved form of a Mumbler, one of these:
